videoFile.title: Video files or URLs
videoFile.description: Upload a video file or URL to process (stored in default key-value store). Supported formats can be found here: https://ffmpeg.org/general.html#File-Formats

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: Timestamp in seconds where to take the thumbnail from video

outputFormat.title: Output format
outputFormat.description: Select the output format. Supported formats can be found here: https://ffmpeg.org/general.html#File-Formats

quality.title: Image quality
quality.description: Select the quality of the output image. The values refer to ffmpeg's quality parameter ranging from 1 to 31.
